title: Kerchief, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton on piña cloth (pineapple fiber)
Technique: embroidered
description: Square kerchief with embroidery on two sides. Design shows a plant in a basket alternating with a leaf and scroll motif. Scalloped edge.
